ye bhishanakari kriyakarakam awasan karanu labuwa da uthure drawida jana samajaya muhuna dun gataluwalata sahimakata pathwiya haki deshapalana wisandumak labi nathi nisa digatama asahanakari hangimak kakaremin pawathinneya yanna apage mathayayi.uthuru saha nagenahira drawida janathawata balapana gatalu walata deshapalanikawa piligatha haki, namuth kriyathmaka kala haki wisandumak soya ganima pinisa, rajaya kal damimakin thorawa ema pra desha wala drawida deshapalana paksha samaga sanwadayak aarambha kala yuthuya.

aadayami thathwaya yahapath wanu atha.raukiraksha wyapara aadiyehi diyunuwak yedenne tharamak badha wimi sama`ginii.aadayami diyunukara ganima sa`daha sitha yomu wanu atha.mahalu ayage upakara himi wanu atha.depola aadiya miladi ganimi athi wana wasaraki.balaporoththu itu wanu atha.namuth raukiraksha aadiyedi nisi wagakimi sahithawa katayuthu kirima yogya wanu atha.wiyadami adhika wiya haki nisa nisi kalamanakaranayak sahithawa katayuthu karanna.
nama lekhana gannata widuhalpathi karyalayata giya wita ape panthiya nama idiripitin athsan kota piyan ankal patalawa apawa rasthiyadu kaleya.
